nodes.text: The T0-D interrogation droid was a wheeled model used by Imperial Intelligence and the Imperial Security Bureau, including aboard the Death Star I. It was equipped with two claws, a stun baton, a sonic stunner, a basic processor, two tool mounts, an improved sensor package, twenty kilograms of internal storage, a durasteel shell, and a vocabulator.

After being introduced in some Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game sourcebooks, these droids -- unnamed -- appeared as enemies in the Super Nintendo game Super Star Wars. First encountered in "Level 11: Death Star Hangar Bay", these droids used their claws to deal damage. The Super Star Wars Official Game Secrets guide to the game refers to them as Buggy droids.
